text: yah sab rasool (jo hamane bheje) unamen se baaz ko baaz par phazeelat dee unamen se baaz to aise hain jinase khud khuda ne baat kee unamen se baaz ke (aur tarah par) darje buland kiye aur mariyam ke bete eesa ko (kaise kaise raushan maujize ata kiye) aur roohulakudas (jibareel) ke zariye se unakee madad kee aur agar khuda chaahata to log in (paigambaron) ke baad huye vah apane paas raushan maujize aa chukane par aapas mein na lad marate magar unamen phoot pad gaee pas unamen se baaz to eemaan laaye aur baaz kaafir ho gaye aur agar khuda chaahata to yah log aapas mein ladate magar khuda vahee karata hai jo chaahata hai
